response.original_title: 本当にあった怖エロ話
response.overview: A couple tests their mettle. However, the man is suddenly buried. A woman is caught running away from a ghost, and she is forced to die. A woman enters a cursed restroom and is confronted by countless shadows that creep up on her without her knowledge. What is the identity of the shadow that pulls off the clothes and devours the woman's body? A cursed cab that takes you to the other world. A cursed karaoke room, an evil spirit inserting an invisible rod into a woman's body, and 20 other shivering images of women being assaulted!
response.title: Scary Erotic Stories That Really Happened
